alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Las Animas County through 330 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Segundo, or 12 miles west of Trinidad, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boncarbo around 255 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cokedale, Trinidad and Starkville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
